entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Gatineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:59 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 6:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 55 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -9.8°C
Wind: WNW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index:

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
